channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Substance3D - Stager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Substance3D - Stager

item.title: CVE-2024-20711|2024-08-01T21:59:42.937Z -- adobe -- substance3d%20-%20stager
item.description: Adobe Substance 3D Stager versions 2.1.3 and earlier are affected by an out-of-bounds read vulnerability that could lead to disclosure of sensitive memory. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to bypass mitigations such as ASLR. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.

item.title: CVE-2024-34115|2024-06-13T13:37:12.076Z -- adobe -- substance3d%20-%20stager
item.description: Substance3D - Stager versions 2.1.4 and earlier are affected by an out-of-bounds write vulnerability that could result in arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.
